analysis.Summary: Vue 3 SFC that displays a list of predefined organization-related documents, allows the user to click on one to open a popup form, fill in inputs, and submit data for verification.
analysis.Purpose: Manage the UI for viewing and adding/updating required organizational documents (passport, INN, SNILS, military ID) within the organizations section of the application.

Components.name: Field
Components.responsibility: Renders a labeled input field and binds its value via v-model.

Components.name: Popup
Components.responsibility: Displays a modal dialog wrapper for the form inputs and emits close events.

Components.name: Button
Components.responsibility: Generic button component for actions (used for submit).

Functions.name: openPopup
Functions.description: Sets currentIndex to the clicked document and opens the popup.

Functions.name: closePopup
Functions.description: Closes the popup by setting showPopup to false.

Functions.name: handleFileUpload
Functions.description: Placeholder for file input change handler; not currently wired up.

Functions.name: submitData
Functions.description: Handles form submission, would update document status and then closes the popup.

Functions.name: redirectTo
Functions.description: Navigates the router to the 'Create Organization People' route (unused).

analysis.Usage: Imported into a parent view or router-controlled page under the organizations module, e.g.: import Documents from 'modules/organizations/components/sections/Documents.vue'; then used in the template as <Documents/>.
Notes: The `documents` array is declared as a plain JS variable, so it is not reactive—changes won’t trigger updates unless wrapped in ref/reactive.
The Popup component is imported as `Select` by mistake but used as <Popup> in template; likely a naming typo.
Props definition is commented out; currently the component uses its own hard-coded documents list instead of receiving it from parent.
The watchEffect has no body logic tied to a reactive source—could be removed or extended.
Two functions (handleFileUpload, onSubmit) and one import (Button) are unused in the current template.
